turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Starbucks Espresso Beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti iced americano with heavy cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to the starbucks in kingsburg, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
